original_text: And all Israel heard say that Saul had smitten a garrison of the Philistines, and that Israel also was had in abomination with the Philistines. And the people were called together after Saul to Gilgal.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘이 사울이 블레셋 사람들의 수비대를 친 것과 이스라엘이 블레셋 사람들의 미움을 받게 되었다 함을 듣고 그 백성이 길갈로 모여 사울을 따르니라

sentences.original_text: that Saul had smitten a garrison of the Philistines
and that Israel also was had in abomination with the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘도 블레셋 사람들에게 가증히 여김을 받았다고

sentences.original_text: And the people were called together after Saul
